item.title: How to predict MBTI analyzing twitter profiles
item.description: The MBTI (Myers-Briggs Personality Type Indicator) divides everyone into 16 distinct personality types across 4 axis: Introversion (I) – Extroversion (E) Intuition (N) – Sensing (S) Thinking (T) – Feeling (F) Judging (J) – Perceiving (P) This system is used in: businesses, online, for fun, for research and lots more. Usually, for knowing which of the 16 personalities is closer to our one we have to answer to a questionnaire; why not automate this task?
